resources.string: We are a property consultancy firm, we are guided by our spirit of enterprise. What does that mean to you? It means as professionals, we embrace even the toughest challenges and are relentlessly creative in solving them. At Property 9, we push each other to be better than we thought we could be. We go the extra step for our clients and partners, creating memorable experience that enhance and grow relationships and we have a lot of fun along the way.

"We are real people \n As consultants we handle all the searching to find you a property.We locate a property for you and we manage and arrange the purchase or leasing of the property for you. We also list your property for rent, advertise it and deal with renters.
